Twister

*Twister smiles as Sinesis shakes her hand*

Twister: Do you know =
of anyone that would like to die?

*Twister asks Sinesis*

  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, =
August 04, 2000 5:52 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  Sinesis eagerly shakes Twist=
er's hand.

  "Partners!" Sinesis says...
    ----- Original Message ----- =

    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, A=
ugust 04, 2000 5:40 PM
    Subject: Re: NBW


    Twister


    *Twister lo=
oks at Sinesis*

    Twister: It seems that we have something in common and=
 I need a partner too.

    *Twister extends her hand to Sinesis*

    Twis=
ter: Partner?

    *Twister asks Sinesis with her hand extended*

      ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:45 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW


   =
   "Traveling alone, though? What about all the bots we killed together? Wh=
at about all of the times we took shots for each other? It's horribly not f=
air. I wish I had a partner still." Sinesis said. He looked closer at Twist=
er.

      "Hey, will you be my partner?" Sinesis askes Twister...
        =
----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
        Sub=
ject: Re: NBW


        Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



        *Twister looks=
 at the sword and sighs*

        Twister: I'll have to get used to the fac=
t that, my sister has a life too and I'll have to learn to travel alone....=


        *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the energon eagles i=
nto her arm compartment*


        *Blizzard looks at Sinister and smiles*
=

        Blizzard: I wonder what's happening back at the base.



        *=
Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*

        Infectra: I trust the both of y=
ou......I did trust the others but....

        *Infectra sighs*

        I=
nfectra: I need to stop thinking of things that upset me. But, it's hard to=
 thinl of the good times because there were hardly none.

        *Infectra=
 says to Airbomber and grins*


          ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
       From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Fri=
day, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
          Subject: Re: NBW


          Sinesis=
 frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.

          "He left this here, wit=
hout it, what shall he do? We have simular problems. I just wish I still ha=
d him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

          Sinister held Blizza=
rds hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his eyes.

          Stranato c=
alls out.

          "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells through the base. A=
irbomber sits down and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

          "Hopefully,=
 the Maximals will listen to us, they must know of the occurences happening=
. I trust Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he hasn't always bee=
n good, but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He laughed at his w=
ords...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: iloveal=
llizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, A=
ugust 03, 2000 11:44 PM
            Subject: Re: NBW


            Twister/=
Blizzard/Infectra



            *Twister looks at Sinesis*

            Tw=
ister: I've decided to let my sister be...For she's my sister and I love he=
r too much to pull her away from the she loves....

            *Twister op=
ens her arm compartment and pulls out a two small pieces of energon both sh=
aped like an eagle*

            Twister: Our parents gave us both one to u=
nite us as sisters and friends forever and always help each other. I found =
Blizzard's on the ground in front of the base. I doubt she dropped it by ac=
cident.....

            *Twister holds out to Sinesis so he can see*



  =
          (OOC: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

       =
     *Blizzard skips out of the cave and walks next to Sinister for The Tea=
m Ultima Base and holds her hand out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*



=
            *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*=



              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE =

              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, August=
 03, 2000 6:59 PM
              Subject: Re: NBW


              Sinesis si=
ghs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

              Sinister f=
rowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.

              "=
Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

              Strana=
to and Airbomber stop at the Maximal base, since they were never set on ene=
my and never betrayed the Maximals, they went on in...
                ----=
- Original Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
          =
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Thursday, August 03, 20=
00 6:46 PM
                Subject: Re: NBW


                Infectra/Wrat=
h/Blizzard/Twister


                *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomb=
er towards the Maximal Base*



                *Wrath gets into a CR Chamb=
er when he arives at the Maximal Base awaits his repairs*



              =
  *Blizzard does a little skip out of the cave walks next to Sinister for t=
he Maximal Base and holds her hand out towards his wanting to hold hands wi=
th him*



                (OOC: Twister is out near the Maximal Base but I=
'm making her come back anyway.)

                *Twister leaves the locat=
ion of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone was else where and went back=
 to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same table as Sinesis*

             =
   Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do....I end up here thinking I'l=
l find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my sister could be sisters a=
nd friends...I was such a fool for believing such happiness could happen...=
..

                *Twister puts her double sided sword away stares at the=
 table*


                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                 =
 From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
 Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
                  Subject: NBW


 =
                 Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the Maximal base.

  =
                Gangon, still dying.

                  Deemos and Inzola c=
onfront one another several times, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.

   =
               Etchingar called out to Megatron.

                  "Hey, d=
o I got the job?" He asked.

                  Time Bomb waited patiently a=
nd Land Mine was healed now. Land Mine looked around, looking to meet Megat=
ron.

                  Sinister came out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizz=
ard.) and started back toward Team Ultima's base.

                  Sinesi=
s was healed and sat down next to Twister...
